head.title: Lulled by the Clack of the Wheels

hedline.hl1: Lulled by the Clack of the Wheels

abstract.p: Comment on silk sleeping-bag sheets from La Sensitive inspired by those used in French overnight trains (Currents); photo (S)

block.p: From La Sensitive come silk sleeping-bag sheets inspired by those used in French overnight trains. They fold up into a pouch. Singles cost $45, doubles $85, in rose, rusty orange, tea green, aubergine, salmon, eau de nil and taupe. Think of them as sheets for people who are trekking the world in style, or keeping laundry light between two homes. Made in Vietnam and available at Roberta Freymann, No. 5F, 23 East 73rd Street, in New York; (212) 585-3767.
